definition: constituting the full quantity or extent, the whole amount, damage beyond the point of repair
details:
adjective
- constituting the full quantity or extent
= synonyms: entire
- complete in extent or degree and in every particular
= synonyms: full
noun
- the whole amount
= synonyms: aggregate
- a quantity obtained by the addition of a group of numbers
= synonyms: amount
verb
- damage beyond the point of repair
= example: damage beyond the point of repair
- determine the sum of
= synonyms: tally
- add up in number or quantity
= synonyms: amount
